content:
As an AI language model, I do not have personal experience, but through my search, I found the following answer:

SWIFT has adapted to advancements in technology in recent years by introducing new features and technologies to its global financial messaging network. 

One such advancement is the SWIFT gpi (global payments innovation) initiative, which enhances cross-border payments by providing real-time information on transaction status, fees, and exchange rates. Another advancement is the use of APIs (Application Programming Interfaces), which allow third-party developers to access SWIFT's network and create new services and applications. 

SWIFT has also improved its cybersecurity measures by introducing ISO 2022 messaging standards and enhancing message validation and authentication processes. Additionally, SWIFT has partnered with other technology companies and financial institutions to create new solutions, such as the SWIFT Access for corporates program, which enables direct integration between corporations and financial institutions. 

Overall, SWIFT has embraced advancements in technology and used them to enhance the security, transparency, and efficiency of its messaging network to better serve its global customer base.
